name: Hypnoid Humanoids
description:
Leave Your Dreams Behind? Made for Games Jobs Live Game Parade Fall 2021 An Asteroids clone where you protect your dreams from your own fears and insecurities, plus other barriers to making them a reality Controls

WASD or arrow keys to move. Space or left mouse button to shoot.

Objective

Destroy enough barriers to your dreams so that you can make them a reality and progress to the next level.

Thanks for playing!
